description:
A mind game of lies and deceit begins! At Academy Island, students battle in Games to win stars, hoping to earn the prestigious title “Seven Star.” Sarasa is last year’s champion and is on track to win again until Hiroto, a new transfer student, hits the scene. Surprisingly, Hiroto defeats her by sheer luck! Now, he must use bluffs and trickery to stay on top.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Gambling
tags.description: Centers around the act of gambling.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/konominoco) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=171980) | [Official Website](http://hcdl.net/kinokonomi/)

Part of the art circle _kinokonomi_ alongside their childhood friend [kino](https://anilist.co/staff/187734).

[Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/takahashi.html)

Japanese composer and arranger working for music production company MONACA since 2013. He is a graduate of Hokkaido University of Education.

__[Artist Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/hirokawa.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayone87)__

__Keiichi Hirokawa__ is a Japanese music composer and arranger who belongs to sound production studio MONACA.

__[Artist Profile (Scoop Music)](https://www.scoop.co.jp/creator/detail.php?cd=10)__

__Shin Furuya__ is a Japanese lyricist.
__Masahiro Tateno__, better known as Juvenile, is a Japanese composer and arranger.
__Masahiro Tateno__, better known as Juvenile, is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Website](https://www.teddyloid.com/)

**TeddyLoid** is a Japanese electronic music producer and DJ. He is known for producing many songs in the soundtrack of Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt, which charted on Oricon Albums Chart. He is also known for partnering with Daoko in "Me!Me!Me!", an anime music video submitted to the 2014 Japan Animator Expo.

TeddyLoid has performed on stages all over the world, with notable performances including Ultra Japan 2018 Main Stage, Anime Expo 2018 in LA, Canada, Australia, and many more. In 2016, TeddyLoid was named one of the Top 5 Japanese Spotify artists streamed globally.

[Website](https://www.teddyloid.com/)
